sources.title: Maniac
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

metadata.Plot: Just when the streets seemed safe, a serial killer with a fetish for scalps is back and on the hunt. Frank is the withdrawn owner of a mannequin store, but his life changes when young artist Anna appears asking for his help with her new exhibition. As their friendship develops and Frank's obsession escalates, it becomes clear that she has unleashed a long-repressed compulsion to stalk and kill.
metadata.Writer: Alexandre Aja, Gr√©gory Levasseur, Joe Spinell
metadata.Actors: Elijah Wood, Nora Arnezeder, America Olivo
